page.title: 06SHOPPING
page.content: There are many food shops in Stratford.We compared a large supermarket with a small corner shop.At the large supermarket called Safeway we filled a basket with 24 products and added the prices together,they came to Â£8.51. At the small corner shop, Avon Dairies the basket came to Â£10.76;a difference of Â£2.25. Safeway:Safeway has been in Stratford since September 18th 1984.About 120 people are employed there and their turnover is Â£150,000 per week.The shop opens from 8.00am to 8.00pm daily.In 15 minutes, 73 people came to the shop Avon Dairies:A.D employs 3 people and the turnover is Â£2400 per week.The opening times are 8.00 a.m to 5.00 p.m daily.In 15 minutes only 6 people came to shop at Avon Dairies. Safeway is much larger and cheaper.
